bug.author: bradyoo
bug.summary: Job Service Summary breaks with invalid type after running transform jobs
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: What version of Alluxio are you using? 2.2.0-SNAPSHOT Describe the bug A clear and concise description of what the bug is. fsadmin report jobservice crashes under certain conditions To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior (as minimally and precisely as possible) Repro Steps:
Start any transformation job. Run bin/alluxio fsadmin report jobservice
Actual: You see "Invalid Type" in output and the script crashes. Expected behavior A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. Expected: See some list of jobs
